title: Business card done right
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lego_card_4742.jpg)

Found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194205/http:/positivesharing.com/2009/02/coolest-business-card-ever/).

(edit) And this one is a business card of [Jørgen Vig Knudstorps, their CEO](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194205/http:/borsen.dk/light/nyhed/138424/).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2189_url_9313_6187.jpg)
author: apankrat

comments.content: They're fantastic, but what kind of wallet do you need to carry them around in?

It makes me want to work for Lego just so I can have the business card. I wonder if they would do custom imprinting.

There is an outfit that makes custom kits of printed imitation Lego blocks, but they're limited to rectangular bricks.
